rows.label: qev060203_MSG0001
rows.name:
Who in their right mind would pull a prank like this
when everyone's banding together to just get by?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0002
rows.name:
I don't know who it is, but they've got seriously poor
taste in jokes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev060203_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what prank Piers is talking about.

rows.label: qev060203_JNK0020
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev060203_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Piers about the stolen voltant.

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0003
rows.name:
Oh, sorry. Some crackpot calling themselves the Light of
Judgment sent a warning to BLADE headquarters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0004
rows.name:
It's a whole ranty mess, but the short version is that
they're going to kill everyone in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0005
rows.name:
It feels too sloppy to be anything organized, though,
so I assume it's just some sicko having a laugh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0006
rows.name:
...Wait, WHAT?! Someone stole the voltant the
Zaruboggan gathered?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0007
rows.name:
Then that threat was... Oh, good lord!
They actually mean to do it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0008
rows.name: Wait, WHAT?! Someone stole it from the Zaruboggan?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0009
rows.name:
Are you serious? Ugh. You just connected two dots I
reaaally didn't want to see connected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh, sorry. Some crackpot calling themselves the Light of
Judgment sent a warning to BLADE headquarters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0011
rows.name:
Said they were going to kill everyone in New LA and
blah de blah blah. It was such an overblown threat
that I figured it had to be a prank, but now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0012
rows.name:
Dammit. It looks like we've got an actual terrorist on
our hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0013
rows.name:
...What's that? You're also searching for whoever is
behind this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0014
rows.name:
Here, then. Take a listen to the threat they sent in.
Maybe it'll give you something to go on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0015
rows.name:
"I stand now in the headwaters of all life.
I invite all incompetent BLADEs to come find me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0016
rows.name:
"If you fail, final judgment will be passed on all,
and New LA will become a city of the dead."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0017
rows.name:
This guy's clearly out of his freaking gourd.
Still, we're in a race against time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0018
rows.name:
Let's split up and search. Headwaters of all life...
Rrrgh! What the hell does that even mean?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0019
rows.name:
What's wrong? You need to hear the threat again?
Here, I'll read it for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0020
rows.name:
"I stand now in the headwaters of all life.
I invite all incompetent BLADEs to come find me."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0021
rows.name:
"If you fail, final judgment will be passed on all,
and New LA will become a city of the dead."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0022
rows.name:
Still just sounds like a bunch of crazy ranting to me.
I mean, where the hell are the "headwaters of all life"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0023
rows.name:
I guess that's it for Mr. Light of Judgment—Homer went
and turned himself in. I hear you talked him into it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0024
rows.name:
He sounded really contrite. What in the world did you
say to get him to do a 180 like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0025
rows.name:
I guess that's it for Mr. Light of Judgment—Homer went
and turned himself in. Guy's like an empty husk now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060203_MSG0026
rows.name:
I wonder what in the hell happened to him? Must have
been something big to do a job like that on the guy.[ST:wait ]
